4951  corner_top_left_background_color_ = value;
4952  return *this;
4953  }

4956  corner_top_right_ = value;
4957  return *this;
4958  }
4959 
4960  Format &corner_top_right_color(Color value) {
4961  corner_top_right_color_ = value;
4962  return *this;
4963  }

4966  corner_top_right_background_color_ = value;
4967  return *this;
4968  }

4971  corner_bottom_left_ = value;
4972  return *this;
4973  }

4976  corner_bottom_left_color_ = value;
4977  return *this;
4978  }

4981  corner_bottom_left_background_color_ = value;

4986  corner_bottom_right_ = value;
4987  return *this;
4988  }

5001  column_separator_ = value;
5002  return *this;
5003  }
5004

5006  column_separator_color_ = value;
5007  return *this;
5008  }

5011  column_separator_background_color_ = value;
5012  return *this;
5013  }

5016  font_align_ = value;
5017  return *this;
5018  }
5019 
5020  Format &font_style(const std::vector<FontStyle> &style) {
5021  if (font_style_.has_value()) {
5022  for (auto &s : style)
5023  font_style_->push_back(s);
5024  } else {
5025  font_style_ = style;
5026  }
5027  return *this;
5028  }
5029 
5030  Format &font_color(Color value) {
5031  font_color_ = value;
5032  return *this;
5033  }
5034 
5035  Format &font_background_color(Color value) {
5036  font_background_color_ = value;
5037  return *this;
5038  }
5039 
5040  Format &color(Color value) {
5041  font_color(value);
5042  border_color(value);
5043  corner_color(value);
5044  return *this;
5045  }
5046 
5047  Format &background_color(Color value) {
5048  font_background_color(value);
5049  border_background_color(value);
5050  corner_background_color(value);
5051  return *this;
5052  }
5053 
5054  Format &multi_byte_characters(bool value) {
5055  multi_byte_characters_ = value;
5056  return *this;
5057  }
5058 
5059  Format &locale(const std::string &value) {
5060  locale_ = value;
5061  return *this;
5062  }
5063 
5064  // Apply word wrap
5065  // Given an input string and a line length, this will insert \n
5066  // in strategic places in input string and apply word wrapping
5067  static std::string word_wrap(const std::string &str, size_t width, const std::string &locale,
5068  bool is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled) {
5069  std::vector<std::string> words = explode_string(str, {" ", "-", "\t"});
5070  size_t current_line_length = 0;
5071  std::string result;
5072 
5073  for (size_t i = 0; i < words.size(); ++i) {
5074  std::string word = words[i];
5075  // If adding the new word to the current line would be too long,
5076  // then put it on a new line (and split it up if it's too long).
5077  if (current_line_length +
5078  get_sequence_length(word, locale, is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled) >
5079  width) {
5080  // Only move down to a new line if we have text on the current line.
5081  // Avoids situation where wrapped whitespace causes emptylines in text.
5082  if (current_line_length > 0) {
5083  result += '\n';
5084  current_line_length = 0;
5085  }
5086 
5087  // If the current word is too long to fit on a line even on it's own then
5088  // split the word up.
5089  while (get_sequence_length(word, locale, is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled) > width) {
5090  result += word.substr(0, width - 1) + "-";
5091  word = word.substr(width - 1);
5092  result += '\n';
5093  }
5094 
5095  // Remove leading whitespace from the word so the new line starts flush to the left.
5096  word = trim_left(word);
5097  }
5098  result += word;
5099  current_line_length +=
5100  get_sequence_length(word, locale, is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled);
5101  }
5102  return result;
5103  }
5104 
5105  static std::vector<std::string> split_lines(const std::string &text, const std::string &delimiter,
5106  const std::string &locale,
5107  bool is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled) {
5108  std::vector<std::string> result{};
5109  std::string input = text;
5110  size_t pos = 0;
5111  std::string token;
5112  while ((pos = input.find(delimiter)) != std::string::npos) {
5113  token = input.substr(0, pos);
5114  result.push_back(token);
5115  input.erase(0, pos + delimiter.length());
5116  }
5117  if (get_sequence_length(input, locale, is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled))
5118  result.push_back(input);
5119  return result;
5120  };
5121 
5122  // Merge two formats
5123  // first has higher precedence
5124  // e.g., first = cell-level formatting and
5125  // second = row-level formatting
5126  // Result has attributes of both with cell-level
5127  // formatting taking precedence
5128  static Format merge(Format first, Format second) {
5129  Format result;
5130 
5131  // Width and height
5132  if (first.width_.has_value())
5133  result.width_ = first.width_;
5134  else
5135  result.width_ = second.width_;
5136 
5137  if (first.height_.has_value())
5138  result.height_ = first.height_;
5139  else
5140  result.height_ = second.height_;
5141 
5142  // Font styling
5143  if (first.font_align_.has_value())
5144  result.font_align_ = first.font_align_;
5145  else
5146  result.font_align_ = second.font_align_;
5147 
5148  if (first.font_style_.has_value()) {
5149  // Merge font styles using std::set_union
5150  std::vector<FontStyle> merged_font_style(first.font_style_->size() +
5151  second.font_style_->size());
5152 #if defined(_WIN32) || defined(_WIN64)
5153  // Fixes error in Windows - Sequence not ordered
5154  std::sort(first.font_style_->begin(), first.font_style_->end());
5155  std::sort(second.font_style_->begin(), second.font_style_->end());
5156 #endif
5157  std::set_union(first.font_style_->begin(), first.font_style_->end(),
5158  second.font_style_->begin(), second.font_style_->end(),
5159  merged_font_style.begin());
5160  result.font_style_ = merged_font_style;
5161  } else
5162  result.font_style_ = second.font_style_;
5163 
5164  if (first.font_color_.has_value())
5165  result.font_color_ = first.font_color_;
5166  else
5167  result.font_color_ = second.font_color_;
5168 
5169  if (first.font_background_color_.has_value())
5170  result.font_background_color_ = first.font_background_color_;
5171  else
5172  result.font_background_color_ = second.font_background_color_;
5173 
5174  // Padding
5175  if (first.padding_left_.has_value())
5176  result.padding_left_ = first.padding_left_;
5177  else
5178  result.padding_left_ = second.padding_left_;
5179 
5180  if (first.padding_top_.has_value())
5181  result.padding_top_ = first.padding_top_;
5182  else
5183  result.padding_top_ = second.padding_top_;
5184 
5185  if (first.padding_right_.has_value())
5186  result.padding_right_ = first.padding_right_;
5187  else
5188  result.padding_right_ = second.padding_right_;
5189 
5190  if (first.padding_bottom_.has_value())
5191  result.padding_bottom_ = first.padding_bottom_;
5192  else
5193  result.padding_bottom_ = second.padding_bottom_;
5194 
5195  // Border
5196  if (first.border_left_.has_value())
5197  result.border_left_ = first.border_left_;
5198  else
5199  result.border_left_ = second.border_left_;
5200 
5201  if (first.border_left_color_.has_value())
5202  result.border_left_color_ = first.border_left_color_;
5203  else
5204  result.border_left_color_ = second.border_left_color_;
5205 
5206  if (first.border_left_background_color_.has_value())
5207  result.border_left_background_color_ = first.border_left_background_color_;
5208  else
5209  result.border_left_background_color_ = second.border_left_background_color_;
5210 
5211  if (first.border_top_.has_value())
5212  result.border_top_ = first.border_top_;
5213  else
5214  result.border_top_ = second.border_top_;
5215 
5216  if (first.border_top_color_.has_value())
5217  result.border_top_color_ = first.border_top_color_;
5218  else
5219  result.border_top_color_ = second.border_top_color_;
5220 
5221  if (first.border_top_background_color_.has_value())
5222  result.border_top_background_color_ = first.border_top_background_color_;
5223  else
5224  result.border_top_background_color_ = second.border_top_background_color_;
5225 
5226  if (first.border_bottom_.has_value())
5227  result.border_bottom_ = first.border_bottom_;
5228  else
5229  result.border_bottom_ = second.border_bottom_;
5230 
5231  if (first.border_bottom_color_.has_value())
5232  result.border_bottom_color_ = first.border_bottom_color_;
5233  else
5234  result.border_bottom_color_ = second.border_bottom_color_;
5235 
5236  if (first.border_bottom_background_color_.has_value())
5237  result.border_bottom_background_color_ = first.border_bottom_background_color_;
5238  else
5239  result.border_bottom_background_color_ = second.border_bottom_background_color_;
5240 
5241  if (first.border_right_.has_value())
5242  result.border_right_ = first.border_right_;
5243  else
5244  result.border_right_ = second.border_right_;
5245 
5246  if (first.border_right_color_.has_value())
5247  result.border_right_color_ = first.border_right_color_;
5248  else
5249  result.border_right_color_ = second.border_right_color_;
5250 
5251  if (first.border_right_background_color_.has_value())
5252  result.border_right_background_color_ = first.border_right_background_color_;
5253  else
5254  result.border_right_background_color_ = second.border_right_background_color_;
5255 
5256  if (first.show_border_top_.has_value())
5257  result.show_border_top_ = first.show_border_top_;
5258  else
5259  result.show_border_top_ = second.show_border_top_;
5260 
5261  if (first.show_border_bottom_.has_value())
5262  result.show_border_bottom_ = first.show_border_bottom_;
5263  else
5264  result.show_border_bottom_ = second.show_border_bottom_;
5265 
5266  if (first.show_border_left_.has_value())
5267  result.show_border_left_ = first.show_border_left_;
5268  else
5269  result.show_border_left_ = second.show_border_left_;
5270 
5271  if (first.show_border_right_.has_value())
5272  result.show_border_right_ = first.show_border_right_;
5273  else
5274  result.show_border_right_ = second.show_border_right_;
5275 
5276  // Corner
5277  if (first.corner_top_left_.has_value())
5278  result.corner_top_left_ = first.corner_top_left_;
5279  else
5280  result.corner_top_left_ = second.corner_top_left_;
5281 
5282  if (first.corner_top_left_color_.has_value())
5283  result.corner_top_left_color_ = first.corner_top_left_color_;
5284  else
5285  result.corner_top_left_color_ = second.corner_top_left_color_;
5286 
5287  if (first.corner_top_left_background_color_.has_value())
5288  result.corner_top_left_background_color_ = first.corner_top_left_background_color_;
5289  else
5290  result.corner_top_left_background_color_ = second.corner_top_left_background_color_;
5291 
5292  if (first.corner_top_right_.has_value())
5293  result.corner_top_right_ = first.corner_top_right_;
5294  else
5295  result.corner_top_right_ = second.corner_top_right_;
5296 
5297  if (first.corner_top_right_color_.has_value())
5298  result.corner_top_right_color_ = first.corner_top_right_color_;
5299  else
5300  result.corner_top_right_color_ = second.corner_top_right_color_;
5301 
5302  if (first.corner_top_right_background_color_.has_value())
5303  result.corner_top_right_background_color_ = first.corner_top_right_background_color_;
5304  else
5305  result.corner_top_right_background_color_ = second.corner_top_right_background_color_;
5306 
5307  if (first.corner_bottom_left_.has_value())
5308  result.corner_bottom_left_ = first.corner_bottom_left_;
5309  else
5310  result.corner_bottom_left_ = second.corner_bottom_left_;
5311 
5312  if (first.corner_bottom_left_color_.has_value())
5313  result.corner_bottom_left_color_ = first.corner_bottom_left_color_;
5314  else
5315  result.corner_bottom_left_color_ = second.corner_bottom_left_color_;
5316 
5317  if (first.corner_bottom_left_background_color_.has_value())
5318  result.corner_bottom_left_background_color_ = first.corner_bottom_left_background_color_;
5319  else
5320  result.corner_bottom_left_background_color_ = second.corner_bottom_left_background_color_;
5321 
5322  if (first.corner_bottom_right_.has_value())
5323  result.corner_bottom_right_ = first.corner_bottom_right_;
5324  else
5325  result.corner_bottom_right_ = second.corner_bottom_right_;
5326 
5327  if (first.corner_bottom_right_color_.has_value())
5328  result.corner_bottom_right_color_ = first.corner_bottom_right_color_;
5329  else
5330  result.corner_bottom_right_color_ = second.corner_bottom_right_color_;
5331 
5332  if (first.corner_bottom_right_background_color_.has_value())
5333  result.corner_bottom_right_background_color_ = first.corner_bottom_right_background_color_;
5334  else
5335  result.corner_bottom_right_background_color_ = second.corner_bottom_right_background_color_;
5336 
5337  // Column separator
5338  if (first.column_separator_.has_value())
5339  result.column_separator_ = first.column_separator_;
5340  else
5341  result.column_separator_ = second.column_separator_;
5342 
5343  if (first.column_separator_color_.has_value())
5344  result.column_separator_color_ = first.column_separator_color_;
5345  else
5346  result.column_separator_color_ = second.column_separator_color_;
5347 
5348  if (first.column_separator_background_color_.has_value())
5349  result.column_separator_background_color_ = first.column_separator_background_color_;
5350  else
5351  result.column_separator_background_color_ = second.column_separator_background_color_;
5352 
5353  // Internationlization
5354  if (first.multi_byte_characters_.has_value())
5355  result.multi_byte_characters_ = first.multi_byte_characters_;
5356  else
5357  result.multi_byte_characters_ = second.multi_byte_characters_;
5358 
5359  if (first.locale_.has_value())
5360  result.locale_ = first.locale_;
5361  else
5362  result.locale_ = second.locale_;
5363 
5364  return result;
5365  }
5366 
5367 private:
5368  friend class Cell;
5369  friend class Row;
5370  friend class Column;
5371  friend class TableInternal;
5372  friend class Printer;
5373  friend class MarkdownExporter;
5374  friend class LatexExporter;
5375  friend class AsciiDocExporter;
5376 
5377  void set_defaults() {
5378  // NOTE: width and height are not set here
5379  font_align_ = FontAlign::left;
5380  font_style_ = std::vector<FontStyle>{};
5381  font_color_ = font_background_color_ = Color::none;
5382  padding_left_ = padding_right_ = 1;
5383  padding_top_ = padding_bottom_ = 0;
5384  border_top_ = border_bottom_ = "-";
5385  border_left_ = border_right_ = "|";
5386  show_border_left_ = show_border_right_ = show_border_top_ = show_border_bottom_ = true;
5387  border_top_color_ = border_top_background_color_ = border_bottom_color_ =
5388  border_bottom_background_color_ = border_left_color_ = border_left_background_color_ =
5389  border_right_color_ = border_right_background_color_ = Color::none;
5390  corner_top_left_ = corner_top_right_ = corner_bottom_left_ = corner_bottom_right_ = "+";
5391  corner_top_left_color_ = corner_top_left_background_color_ = corner_top_right_color_ =
5392  corner_top_right_background_color_ = corner_bottom_left_color_ =
5393  corner_bottom_left_background_color_ = corner_bottom_right_color_ =
5394  corner_bottom_right_background_color_ = Color::none;
5395  column_separator_ = "|";
5396  column_separator_color_ = column_separator_background_color_ = Color::none;
5397  multi_byte_characters_ = false;
5398  locale_ = "";
5399  }
5400 
5401  // Helper methods for word wrapping:
5402 
5403  // trim white spaces from the left end of an input string
5404  static std::string trim_left(const std::string &input_string) {
5405  std::string result = input_string;
5406  result.erase(result.begin(), std::find_if(result.begin(), result.end(),
5407  [](int ch) { return !std::isspace(ch); }));
5408  return result;
5409  }
5410 
5411  // trim white spaces from right end of an input string
5412  static std::string trim_right(const std::string &input_string) {
5413  std::string result = input_string;
5414  result.erase(
5415  std::find_if(result.rbegin(), result.rend(), [](int ch) { return !std::isspace(ch); })
5416  .base(),
5417  result.end());
5418  return result;
5419  }
5420 
5421  // trim white spaces from either end of an input string
5422  static std::string trim(const std::string &input_string) {
5423  return trim_left(trim_right(input_string));
5424  }
5425 
5426  static size_t index_of_any(const std::string &input, size_t start_index,
5427  const std::vector<std::string> &split_characters) {
5428  std::vector<size_t> indices{};
5429  for (auto &c : split_characters) {
5430  auto index = input.find(c, start_index);
5431  if (index != std::string::npos)
5432  indices.push_back(index);
5433  }
5434  if (indices.size() > 0)
5435  return *std::min_element(indices.begin(), indices.end());
5436  else
5437  return std::string::npos;
5438  }
5439 
5440  static std::vector<std::string> explode_string(const std::string &input,
5441  const std::vector<std::string> &split_characters) {
5442  std::vector<std::string> result{};
5443  size_t start_index{0};
5444  while (true) {
5445  auto index = index_of_any(input, start_index, split_characters);
5446 
5447  if (index == std::string::npos) {
5448  result.push_back(input.substr(start_index));
5449  return result;
5450  }
5451 
5452  std::string word = input.substr(start_index, index - start_index);
5453  char next_character = input.substr(index, 1)[0];
5454  // Unlike whitespace, dashes and the like should stick to the word occurring before it.
5455  if (isspace(next_character)) {
5456  result.push_back(word);
5457  result.push_back(std::string(1, next_character));
5458  } else {
5459  result.push_back(word + next_character);
5460  }
5461  start_index = index + 1;
5462  }
5463 
5464  return result;
5465  }
5466 
5467  // Element width and height
5468  optional<size_t> width_{};
5469  optional<size_t> height_{};
5470 
5471  // Font styling
5472  optional<FontAlign> font_align_{};
5473  optional<std::vector<FontStyle>> font_style_{};
5474  optional<Color> font_color_{};
5475  optional<Color> font_background_color_{};
5476 
5477  // Element padding
5478  optional<size_t> padding_left_{};
5479  optional<size_t> padding_top_{};
5480  optional<size_t> padding_right_{};
5481  optional<size_t> padding_bottom_{};
5482 
5483  // Element border
5484  optional<bool> show_border_top_{};
5485  optional<std::string> border_top_{};
5486  optional<Color> border_top_color_{};
5487  optional<Color> border_top_background_color_{};
5488 
5489  optional<bool> show_border_bottom_{};
5490  optional<std::string> border_bottom_{};
5491  optional<Color> border_bottom_color_{};
5492  optional<Color> border_bottom_background_color_{};
5493 
5494  optional<bool> show_border_left_{};
5495  optional<std::string> border_left_{};
5496  optional<Color> border_left_color_{};
5497  optional<Color> border_left_background_color_{};
5498 
5499  optional<bool> show_border_right_{};
5500  optional<std::string> border_right_{};
5501  optional<Color> border_right_color_{};
5502  optional<Color> border_right_background_color_{};
5503 
5504  // Element corner
5505  optional<std::string> corner_top_left_{};
5506  optional<Color> corner_top_left_color_{};
5507  optional<Color> corner_top_left_background_color_{};
5508 
5509  optional<std::string> corner_top_right_{};
5510  optional<Color> corner_top_right_color_{};
5511  optional<Color> corner_top_right_background_color_{};
5512 
5513  optional<std::string> corner_bottom_left_{};
5514  optional<Color> corner_bottom_left_color_{};
5515  optional<Color> corner_bottom_left_background_color_{};
5516 
5517  optional<std::string> corner_bottom_right_{};
5518  optional<Color> corner_bottom_right_color_{};
5519  optional<Color> corner_bottom_right_background_color_{};
5520 
5521  // Element column separator
5522  optional<std::string> column_separator_{};
5523  optional<Color> column_separator_color_{};
5524  optional<Color> column_separator_background_color_{};
5525 
5526  // Internationalization
5527  optional<bool> multi_byte_characters_{};
5528  optional<std::string> locale_{};
5529 };
5530 
5531 } // namespace tabulate
5532 
5533 // #include <tabulate/utf8.hpp>
5534 
5535 #if __cplusplus >= 201703L
5536 #include <optional>
5537 using std::optional;
5538 #else
5539 // #include <tabulate/optional_lite.hpp>
5540 using nonstd::optional;
5541 #endif
5542 
5543 #include <vector>
5544 
5545 namespace tabulate {
5546 
5547 class Cell {
5548 public:
5549  explicit Cell(std::shared_ptr<class Row> parent) : parent_(parent) {}
5550 
5551  void set_text(const std::string &text) { data_ = text; }
5552 
5553  const std::string &get_text() { return data_; }
5554 
5555  size_t size() {
5556  return get_sequence_length(data_, locale(), is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled());
5557  }
5558 
5559  std::string locale() { return *format().locale_; }
5560 
5561  Format &format();
5562 
5563  bool is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled();
5564 
5565 private:
5566  std::string data_;
5567  std::weak_ptr<class Row> parent_;
5568  optional<Format> format_;
5569 };
5570 
5571 } // namespace tabulate
5572

5605 #pragma once
5606 #include <iostream>
5607 #include <memory>
5608 #include <string>
5609 // #include <tabulate/cell.hpp>
5610 
5611 #if __cplusplus >= 201703L
5612 #include <optional>
5613 using std::optional;
5614 #else
5615 // #include <tabulate/optional_lite.hpp>
5616 using nonstd::optional;
5617 #endif
5618 
5619 #include <vector>
5620 #ifdef max
5621 #undef max
5622 #endif
5623 #ifdef min
5624 #undef min
5625 #endif
5626 
5627 namespace tabulate {
5628 
5629 class Row {
5630 public:
5631  explicit Row(std::shared_ptr<class TableInternal> parent) : parent_(parent) {}
5632 
5633  void add_cell(std::shared_ptr<Cell> cell) { cells_.push_back(cell); }
5634 
5635  Cell &operator[](size_t index) { return cell(index); }
5636 
5637  Cell &cell(size_t index) { return *(cells_[index]); }
5638 
5639  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Cell>> cells() const { return cells_; }
5640 
5641  size_t size() const { return cells_.size(); }
5642 
5643  Format &format();
5644 
5645  class CellIterator {
5646  public:
5647  explicit CellIterator(std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Cell>>::iterator ptr) : ptr(ptr) {}
5648 
5649  CellIterator operator++() {
5650  ++ptr;
5651  return *this;
5652  }
5653  bool operator!=(const CellIterator &other) const { return ptr != other.ptr; }
5654  Cell &operator*() { return **ptr; }
5655 
5656  private:
5657  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Cell>>::iterator ptr;
5658  };
5659 
5660  auto begin() -> CellIterator { return CellIterator(cells_.begin()); }
5661  auto end() -> CellIterator { return CellIterator(cells_.end()); }
5662 
5663 private:
5664  friend class Printer;
5665 
5666  // Returns the row height as configured
5667  // For each cell in the row, check the cell.format.height
5668  // property and return the largest configured row height
5669  // This is used to ensure that all cells in a row are
5670  // aligned when printing the column
5671  size_t get_configured_height() {
5672  size_t result{0};
5673  for (size_t i = 0; i < size(); ++i) {
5674  auto cell = cells_[i];
5675  auto format = cell->format();
5676  if (format.height_.has_value())
5677  result = std::max(result, *format.height_);
5678  }
5679  return result;
5680  }
5681 
5682  // Computes the height of the row based on cell contents
5683  // and configured cell padding
5684  // For each cell, compute:
5685  // padding_top + (cell_contents / column height) + padding_bottom
5686  // and return the largest value
5687  //
5688  // This is useful when no cell.format.height is configured
5689  // Call get_configured_height()
5690  // - If this returns 0, then use get_computed_height()
5691  size_t get_computed_height(const std::vector<size_t> &column_widths) {
5692  size_t result{0};
5693  for (size_t i = 0; i < size(); ++i) {
5694  result = std::max(result, get_cell_height(i, column_widths[i]));
5695  }
5696  return result;
5697  }
5698 
5699  // Returns padding_top + cell_contents / column_height + padding_bottom
5700  // for a given cell in the column
5701  // e.g.,
5702  // column width = 5
5703  // cell_contents = "I love tabulate" (size/length = 15)
5704  // padding top and padding bottom are 1
5705  // then, cell height = 1 + (15 / 5) + 1 = 1 + 3 + 1 = 5
5706  // The cell will look like this:
5707  //
5708  // .....
5709  // I lov
5710  // e tab
5711  // ulate
5712  // .....
5713  size_t get_cell_height(size_t cell_index, size_t column_width) {
5714  size_t result{0};
5715  Cell &cell = *(cells_[cell_index]);
5716  auto format = cell.format();
5717  auto text = cell.get_text();
5718 
5719  auto padding_left = *format.padding_left_;
5720  auto padding_right = *format.padding_right_;
5721 
5722  result += *format.padding_top_;
5723 
5724  if (column_width > (padding_left + padding_right)) {
5725  column_width -= (padding_left + padding_right);
5726  }
5727 
5728  // Check if input text has embedded newline characters
5729  auto newlines_in_text = std::count(text.begin(), text.end(), '\n');
5730  std::string word_wrapped_text;
5731  if (newlines_in_text == 0) {
5732  // No new lines in input
5733  // Apply automatic word wrapping and compute row height
5734  word_wrapped_text = Format::word_wrap(text, column_width, cell.locale(),
5735  cell.is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled());
5736  } else {
5737  // There are embedded '\n' characters
5738  // Respect these characters
5739  word_wrapped_text = text;
5740  }
5741 
5742  auto newlines_in_wrapped_text =
5743  std::count(word_wrapped_text.begin(), word_wrapped_text.end(), '\n');
5744  auto estimated_row_height = newlines_in_wrapped_text;
5745 
5746  if (!word_wrapped_text.empty() &&
5747  word_wrapped_text[word_wrapped_text.size() - 1] != '\n') // text doesn't end with a newline
5748  estimated_row_height += 1;
5749 
5750  result += estimated_row_height;
5751 
5752  result += *format.padding_bottom_;
5753 
5754  return result;
5755  }
5756 
5757  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Cell>> cells_;
5758  std::weak_ptr<class TableInternal> parent_;
5759  optional<Format> format_;
5760 };
5761 
5762 } // namespace tabulate
5763 
5764 /*
5765  __ ___. .__ __
5766 _/ |______ \_ |__ __ __| | _____ _/ |_ ____
5767 \ __\__ \ | __ \| | \ | \__ \\ __\/ __ \
5768  | | / __ \| \_\ \ | / |__/ __ \| | \ ___/
5769  |__| (____ /___ /____/|____(____ /__| \___ >
5770  \/ \/ \/ \/
5771 Table Maker for Modern C++
5772 https://github.com/p-ranav/tabulate
5773 
5774 Licensed under the MIT License <http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT>.
5775 SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
5776 Copyright (c) 2019 Pranav Srinivas Kumar <pranav.srinivas.kumar@gmail.com>.
5777 
5778 Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy
5779 of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
5780 in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
5781 to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
5782 copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
5783 furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
5784

5786 copies or substantial portions of the Software.

5789 IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
5790 FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
5791 AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
5792 LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
5793 OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
5794 SOFTWARE.

5796 #pragma once
5797 
5798 namespace tabulate {
5799 
5800 class ColumnFormat : public Format {
5801 public:
5802  explicit ColumnFormat(class Column &column) : column_(column) {}
5803 
5804  ColumnFormat &width(size_t value);
5805  ColumnFormat &height(size_t value);
5806 
5807  // Padding
5808  ColumnFormat &padding(size_t value);
5809  ColumnFormat &padding_left(size_t value);
5810  ColumnFormat &padding_right(size_t value);
5811  ColumnFormat &padding_top(size_t value);
5812  ColumnFormat &padding_bottom(size_t value);
5813 
5814  // Border
5815  ColumnFormat &border(const std::string &value);
5816  ColumnFormat &border_color(Color value);
5817  ColumnFormat &border_background_color(Color value);
5818  ColumnFormat &border_left(const std::string &value);
5819  ColumnFormat &border_left_color(Color value);
5820  ColumnFormat &border_left_background_color(Color value);
5821  ColumnFormat &border_right(const std::string &value);
5822  ColumnFormat &border_right_color(Color value);
5823  ColumnFormat &border_right_background_color(Color value);
5824  ColumnFormat &border_top(const std::string &value);
5825  ColumnFormat &border_top_color(Color value);
5826  ColumnFormat &border_top_background_color(Color value);
5827  ColumnFormat &border_bottom(const std::string &value);
5828  ColumnFormat &border_bottom_color(Color value);
5829  ColumnFormat &border_bottom_background_color(Color value);
5830 
5831  // Corner
5832  ColumnFormat &corner(const std::string &value);
5833  ColumnFormat &corner_color(Color value);
5834  ColumnFormat &corner_background_color(Color value);
5835 
5836  // Column separator
5837  ColumnFormat &column_separator(const std::string &value);
5838  ColumnFormat &column_separator_color(Color value);
5839  ColumnFormat &column_separator_background_color(Color value);
5840 
5841  // Font styling
5842  ColumnFormat &font_align(FontAlign value);
5843  ColumnFormat &font_style(const std::vector<FontStyle> &style);
5844  ColumnFormat &font_color(Color value);
5845  ColumnFormat &font_background_color(Color value);
5846  ColumnFormat &color(Color value);
5847  ColumnFormat &background_color(Color value);
5848 
5849  // Locale
5850  ColumnFormat &multi_byte_characters(bool value);
5851  ColumnFormat &locale(const std::string &value);
5852 
5853 private:
5854  std::reference_wrapper<class Column> column_;
5855 };
5856 
5857 } // namespace tabulate
5858 
5859 /*
5860  __ ___. .__ __
5861 _/ |______ \_ |__ __ __| | _____ _/ |_ ____
5862 \ __\__ \ | __ \| | \ | \__ \\ __\/ __ \
5863  | | / __ \| \_\ \ | / |__/ __ \| | \ ___/
5864  |__| (____ /___ /____/|____(____ /__| \___ >
5865  \/ \/ \/ \/
5866 Table Maker for Modern C++
5867 https://github.com/p-ranav/tabulate
5868 
5869 Licensed under the MIT License <http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT>.
5870 SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
5871 Copyright (c) 2019 Pranav Srinivas Kumar <pranav.srinivas.kumar@gmail.com>.
5872 
5873 Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy
5874 of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
5875 in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
5876 to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
5877 copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
5878 furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
5879 
5880 The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
5881 copies or substantial portions of the Software.
5882 
5883 THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
5884 IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
5885 FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
5886 AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
5887 LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
5888 OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
5889 SOFTWARE.

5891 #pragma once
5892 #include <algorithm>
5893 #include <functional>
5894 #include <iostream>
5895 #include <memory>
5896 #include <optional>
5897 #include <string>
5898 // #include <tabulate/cell.hpp>
5899 // #include <tabulate/column_format.hpp>
5900 #include <vector>
5901 #ifdef max
5902 #undef max
5903 #endif
5904 #ifdef min
5905 #undef min
5906 #endif
5907 
5908 namespace tabulate {
5909 
5910 class Column {
5911 public:
5912  explicit Column(std::shared_ptr<class TableInternal> parent) : parent_(parent) {}
5913 
5914  void add_cell(Cell &cell) { cells_.push_back(cell); }
5915 
5916  Cell &operator[](size_t index) { return cells_[index]; }
5917 
5918  std::vector<std::reference_wrapper<Cell>> cells() const { return cells_; }
5919 
5920  size_t size() const { return cells_.size(); }
5921 
5922  ColumnFormat format() { return ColumnFormat(*this); }
5923 
5924  class CellIterator {
5925  public:
5926  explicit CellIterator(std::vector<std::reference_wrapper<Cell>>::iterator ptr) : ptr(ptr) {}
5927 
5928  CellIterator operator++() {
5929  ++ptr;
5930  return *this;
5931  }
5932  bool operator!=(const CellIterator &other) const { return ptr != other.ptr; }
5933  Cell &operator*() { return *ptr; }
5934 
5935  private:
5936  std::vector<std::reference_wrapper<Cell>>::iterator ptr;
5937  };
5938 
5939  auto begin() -> CellIterator { return CellIterator(cells_.begin()); }
5940  auto end() -> CellIterator { return CellIterator(cells_.end()); }
5941 
5942 private:
5943  friend class ColumnFormat;
5944  friend class Printer;
5945 
5946  // Returns the column width as configured
5947  // For each cell in the column, check the cell.format.width
5948  // property and return the largest configured column width
5949  // This is used to ensure that all cells in a column are
5950  // aligned when printing the column
5951  size_t get_configured_width() {
5952  size_t result{0};
5953  for (size_t i = 0; i < size(); ++i) {
5954  auto cell = cells_[i];
5955  auto format = cell.get().format();
5956  if (format.width_.has_value())
5957  result = std::max(result, *format.width_);
5958  }
5959  return result;
5960  }
5961 
5962  // Computes the width of the column based on cell contents
5963  // and configured cell padding
5964  // For each cell, compute padding_left + cell_contents + padding_right
5965  // and return the largest value
5966  //
5967  // This is useful when no cell.format.width is configured
5968  // Call get_configured_width()
5969  // - If this returns 0, then use get_computed_width()
5970  size_t get_computed_width() {
5971  size_t result{0};
5972  for (size_t i = 0; i < size(); ++i) {
5973  result = std::max(result, get_cell_width(i));
5974  }
5975  return result;
5976  }
5977 
5978  // Returns padding_left + cell_contents.size() + padding_right
5979  // for a given cell in the column
5980  size_t get_cell_width(size_t cell_index) {
5981  size_t result{0};
5982  Cell &cell = cells_[cell_index].get();
5983  auto format = cell.format();
5984  if (format.padding_left_.has_value())
5985  result += *format.padding_left_;
5986 
5987  // Check if input text has newlines
5988  auto text = cell.get_text();
5989  auto split_lines = Format::split_lines(text, "\n", cell.locale(),
5990  cell.is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled());
5991 
5992  // If there are no newlines in input, set column_width = text.size()
5993  if (split_lines.size() == 1) {
5994  result += cell.size();
5995  } else {
5996  // There are newlines in input
5997  // Find widest substring in input and use this as column_width
5998  size_t widest_sub_string_size{0};
5999  for (auto &line : split_lines)
6000  if (get_sequence_length(line, cell.locale(),
6001  cell.is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled()) >
6002  widest_sub_string_size)
6003  widest_sub_string_size = get_sequence_length(
6004  line, cell.locale(), cell.is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled());
6005  result += widest_sub_string_size;
6006  }
6007 
6008  if (format.padding_right_.has_value())
6009  result += *format.padding_right_;
6010 
6011  return result;
6012  }
6013 
6014  std::vector<std::reference_wrapper<Cell>> cells_;
6015  std::weak_ptr<class TableInternal> parent_;
6016 };
6017 
6018 inline ColumnFormat &ColumnFormat::width(size_t value) {
6019  for (auto &cell : column_.get().cells_)
6020  cell.get().format().width(value);
6021  return *this;
6022 }
6023 
6024 inline ColumnFormat &ColumnFormat::height(size_t value) {
6025  for (auto &cell : column_.get().cells_)
6026  cell.get().format().height(value);
6027  return *this;
6028 }
6029 
6030 inline ColumnFormat &ColumnFormat::padding(size_t value) {
6031  for (auto &cell : column_.get().cells_)
6032  cell.get().format().padding(value);
6033  return *this;
6034 }
6035 
6036 inline ColumnFormat &ColumnFormat::padding_left(size_t value) {
6037  for (auto &cell : column_.get().cells_)
6038  cell.get().format().padding_left(value);
6039  return *this;
6040 }
6041 
6042 inline ColumnFormat &ColumnFormat::padding_right(size_t value) {
6043  for (auto &cell : column_.get().cells_)
6044  cell.get().format().padding_right(value);
6045  return *this;
6046 }
6047 
6048 inline ColumnFormat &ColumnFormat::padding_top(size_t value) {
6049  for (auto &cell : column_.get().cells_)
6050  cell.get().format().padding_top(value);
6051  return *this;
6052 }
6053 
6054 inline ColumnFormat &ColumnFormat::padding_bottom(size_t value) {
6055  for (auto &cell : column_.get().cells_)
6056  cell.get().format().padding_bottom(value);
6057  return *this;
6058 }
6059

6062  cell.get().format().border(value);
6063  return *this;
6064 }

6075  return *this;
6076 }

6082 }

6098  cell.get().format().border_right(value);
6099  return *this;
6100 }
6101

6224  cell.get().format().multi_byte_characters(value);

6226 }

6231  return *this;
6232 }

6254 copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
6255 furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:

6258 copies or substantial portions of the Software.

6268 #pragma once
6269 // #include <tabulate/color.hpp>
6270 // #include <tabulate/font_style.hpp>
6271 #include <utility>
6272 #include <vector>
6273 
6274 namespace tabulate {
6275 
6276 class Printer {
6277 public:
6278  static std::pair<std::vector<size_t>, std::vector<size_t>>
6279  compute_cell_dimensions(TableInternal &table);
6280 
6281  static void print_table(std::ostream &stream, TableInternal &table);
6282 
6283  static void print_row_in_cell(std::ostream &stream, TableInternal &table,
6284  const std::pair<size_t, size_t> &index,
6285  const std::pair<size_t, size_t> &dimension, size_t num_columns,
6286  size_t row_index);
6287 
6288  static bool print_cell_border_top(std::ostream &stream, TableInternal &table,
6289  const std::pair<size_t, size_t> &index,
6290  const std::pair<size_t, size_t> &dimension, size_t num_columns);
6291  static bool print_cell_border_bottom(std::ostream &stream, TableInternal &table,
6292  const std::pair<size_t, size_t> &index,
6293  const std::pair<size_t, size_t> &dimension,
6294  size_t num_columns);
6295 
6296  static void apply_element_style(std::ostream &stream, Color foreground_color,
6297  Color background_color,
6298  const std::vector<FontStyle> &font_style) {
6299  apply_foreground_color(stream, foreground_color);
6300  apply_background_color(stream, background_color);
6301  for (auto &style : font_style)
6302  apply_font_style(stream, style);
6303  }
6304 
6305  static void reset_element_style(std::ostream &stream) { stream << termcolor::reset; }
6306 
6307 private:
6308  static void print_content_left_aligned(std::ostream &stream, const std::string &cell_content,
6309  const Format &format, size_t text_with_padding_size,
6310  size_t column_width) {
6311 
6312  // Apply font style
6313  apply_element_style(stream, *format.font_color_, *format.font_background_color_,
6314  *format.font_style_);
6315  stream << cell_content;
6316  // Only apply font_style to the font
6317  // Not the padding. So calling apply_element_style with font_style = {}
6318  reset_element_style(stream);
6319  apply_element_style(stream, *format.font_color_, *format.font_background_color_, {});
6320 
6321  if (text_with_padding_size < column_width) {
6322  for (size_t j = 0; j < (column_width - text_with_padding_size); ++j) {
6323  stream << " ";
6324  }
6325  }
6326  }
6327 
6328  static void print_content_center_aligned(std::ostream &stream, const std::string &cell_content,
6329  const Format &format, size_t text_with_padding_size,
6330  size_t column_width) {
6331  auto num_spaces = column_width - text_with_padding_size;
6332  if (num_spaces % 2 == 0) {
6333  // Even spacing on either side
6334  for (size_t j = 0; j < num_spaces / 2; ++j)
6335  stream << " ";
6336 
6337  // Apply font style
6338  apply_element_style(stream, *format.font_color_, *format.font_background_color_,
6339  *format.font_style_);
6340  stream << cell_content;
6341  // Only apply font_style to the font
6342  // Not the padding. So calling apply_element_style with font_style = {}
6343  reset_element_style(stream);
6344  apply_element_style(stream, *format.font_color_, *format.font_background_color_, {});
6345 
6346  for (size_t j = 0; j < num_spaces / 2; ++j)
6347  stream << " ";
6348  } else {
6349  auto num_spaces_before = num_spaces / 2 + 1;
6350  for (size_t j = 0; j < num_spaces_before; ++j)
6351  stream << " ";
6352 
6353  // Apply font style
6354  apply_element_style(stream, *format.font_color_, *format.font_background_color_,
6355  *format.font_style_);
6356  stream << cell_content;
6357  // Only apply font_style to the font
6358  // Not the padding. So calling apply_element_style with font_style = {}
6359  reset_element_style(stream);
6360  apply_element_style(stream, *format.font_color_, *format.font_background_color_, {});
6361 
6362  for (size_t j = 0; j < num_spaces - num_spaces_before; ++j)
6363  stream << " ";
6364  }
6365  }
6366 
6367  static void print_content_right_aligned(std::ostream &stream, const std::string &cell_content,
6368  const Format &format, size_t text_with_padding_size,
6369  size_t column_width) {
6370  if (text_with_padding_size < column_width) {
6371  for (size_t j = 0; j < (column_width - text_with_padding_size); ++j) {
6372  stream << " ";
6373  }
6374  }
6375 
6376  // Apply font style
6377  apply_element_style(stream, *format.font_color_, *format.font_background_color_,
6378  *format.font_style_);
6379  stream << cell_content;
6380  // Only apply font_style to the font
6381  // Not the padding. So calling apply_element_style with font_style = {}
6382  reset_element_style(stream);
6383  apply_element_style(stream, *format.font_color_, *format.font_background_color_, {});
6384  }
6385 
6386  static void apply_font_style(std::ostream &stream, FontStyle style) {
6387  switch (style) {
6388  case FontStyle::bold:
6389  stream << termcolor::bold;
6390  break;
6391  case FontStyle::dark:
6392  stream << termcolor::dark;
6393  break;
6394  case FontStyle::italic:
6395  stream << termcolor::italic;
6396  break;
6397  case FontStyle::underline:
6398  stream << termcolor::underline;
6399  break;
6400  case FontStyle::blink:
6401  stream << termcolor::blink;
6402  break;
6403  case FontStyle::reverse:
6404  stream << termcolor::reverse;
6405  break;
6406  case FontStyle::concealed:
6407  stream << termcolor::concealed;
6408  break;
6409  case FontStyle::crossed:
6410  stream << termcolor::crossed;
6411  break;
6412  default:
6413  break;
6414  }
6415  }
6416 
6417  static void apply_foreground_color(std::ostream &stream, Color foreground_color) {
6418  switch (foreground_color) {
6419  case Color::grey:
6420  stream << termcolor::grey;
6421  break;
6422  case Color::red:
6423  stream << termcolor::red;
6424  break;
6425  case Color::green:
6426  stream << termcolor::green;
6427  break;
6428  case Color::yellow:
6429  stream << termcolor::yellow;
6430  break;
6431  case Color::blue:
6432  stream << termcolor::blue;
6433  break;
6434  case Color::magenta:
6435  stream << termcolor::magenta;
6436  break;
6437  case Color::cyan:
6438  stream << termcolor::cyan;
6439  break;
6440  case Color::white:
6441  stream << termcolor::white;
6442  break;
6443  case Color::none:
6444  default:
6445  break;
6446  }
6447  }
6448 
6449  static void apply_background_color(std::ostream &stream, Color background_color) {
6450  switch (background_color) {
6451  case Color::grey:
6452  stream << termcolor::on_grey;
6453  break;
6454  case Color::red:
6455  stream << termcolor::on_red;
6456  break;
6457  case Color::green:
6458  stream << termcolor::on_green;
6459  break;
6460  case Color::yellow:
6461  stream << termcolor::on_yellow;
6462  break;
6463  case Color::blue:
6464  stream << termcolor::on_blue;
6465  break;
6466  case Color::magenta:
6467  stream << termcolor::on_magenta;
6468  break;
6469  case Color::cyan:
6470  stream << termcolor::on_cyan;
6471  break;
6472  case Color::white:
6473  stream << termcolor::on_white;
6474  break;
6475  case Color::none:
6476  default:
6477  break;
6478  }
6479  }
6480 };
6481 
6482 } // namespace tabulate
6483

6485  __ ___. .__ __
6486 _/ |______ \_ |__ __ __| | _____ _/ |_ ____
6487 \ __\__ \ | __ \| | \ | \__ \\ __\/ __ \
6488  | | / __ \| \_\ \ | / |__/ __ \| | \ ___/
6489  |__| (____ /___ /____/|____(____ /__| \___ >
6490  \/ \/ \/ \/
6491 Table Maker for Modern C++
6492 https://github.com/p-ranav/tabulate
6493

6497

6499 of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
6500 in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
6501 to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
6502 copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
6503 furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
6504 
6505 The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
6506 copies or substantial portions of the Software.
6507 
6508 THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
6509 IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
6510 FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
6511 AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
6512 LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
