6516 #pragma once
6517 #include <algorithm>
6518 #include <iostream>
6519 #include <string>
6520 // #include <tabulate/column.hpp>
6521 // #include <tabulate/font_style.hpp>
6522 // #include <tabulate/printer.hpp>
6523 // #include <tabulate/row.hpp>
6524 // #include <tabulate/termcolor.hpp>
6525 #include <vector>
6526 #ifdef max
6527 #undef max
6528 #endif
6529 #ifdef min
6530 #undef min
6531 #endif
6532 
6533 namespace tabulate {
6534 
6535 class TableInternal : public std::enable_shared_from_this<TableInternal> {
6536 public:
6537  static std::shared_ptr<TableInternal> create() {
6538  auto result = std::shared_ptr<TableInternal>(new TableInternal());
6539  result->format_.set_defaults();
6540  return result;
6541  }
6542 
6543  void add_row(const std::vector<std::string> &cells) {
6544  auto row = std::make_shared<Row>(shared_from_this());
6545  for (auto &c : cells) {
6546  auto cell = std::make_shared<Cell>(row);
6547  cell->set_text(c);
6548  row->add_cell(cell);
6549  }
6550  rows_.push_back(row);
6551  }
6552 
6553  Row &operator[](size_t index) { return *(rows_[index]); }
6554 
6555  const Row &operator[](size_t index) const { return *(rows_[index]); }
6556 
6557  Column column(size_t index) {
6558  Column column(shared_from_this());
6559  for (size_t i = 0; i < rows_.size(); ++i) {
6560  auto row = rows_[i];
6561  auto &cell = row->cell(index);
6562  column.add_cell(cell);
6563  }
6564  return column;
6565  }
6566 
6567  size_t size() const { return rows_.size(); }
6568 
6569  std::pair<size_t, size_t> shape() {
6570  std::pair<size_t, size_t> result{0, 0};
6571  std::stringstream stream;
6572  print(stream);
6573  auto buffer = stream.str();
6574  auto lines = Format::split_lines(buffer, "\n", "", true);
6575  if (lines.size()) {
6576  result = {get_sequence_length(lines[0], "", true), lines.size()};
6577  }
6578  return result;
6579  }
6580 
6581  Format &format() { return format_; }
6582 
6583  void print(std::ostream &stream) { Printer::print_table(stream, *this); }
6584 
6585  size_t estimate_num_columns() const {
6586  size_t result{0};
6587  if (size()) {
6588  auto first_row = operator[](size_t(0));
6589  result = first_row.size();
6590  }
6591  return result;
6592  }
6593 
6594 private:
6595  friend class Table;
6596  friend class MarkdownExporter;
6597 
6598  TableInternal() {}
6599  TableInternal &operator=(const TableInternal &);
6600  TableInternal(const TableInternal &);
6601 
6602  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Row>> rows_;
6603  Format format_;
6604 };
6605 
6606 inline Format &Cell::format() {
6607  std::shared_ptr<Row> parent = parent_.lock();
6608  if (!format_.has_value()) { // no cell format
6609  format_ = parent->format(); // Use parent row format
6610  } else {
6611  // Cell has formatting
6612  // Merge cell formatting with parent row formatting
6613  format_ = Format::merge(*format_, parent->format());
6614  }
6615  return *format_;
6616 }
6617 
6618 inline bool Cell::is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled() {
6619  return (*format().multi_byte_characters_);
6620 }
6621 
6622 inline Format &Row::format() {
6623  std::shared_ptr<TableInternal> parent = parent_.lock();
6624  if (!format_.has_value()) { // no row format
6625  format_ = parent->format(); // Use parent table format
6626  } else {
6627  // Row has formatting rules
6628  // Merge with parent table format
6629  format_ = Format::merge(*format_, parent->format());
6630  }
6631  return *format_;
6632 }
6633 
6634 inline std::pair<std::vector<size_t>, std::vector<size_t>>
6635 Printer::compute_cell_dimensions(TableInternal &table) {
6636  std::pair<std::vector<size_t>, std::vector<size_t>> result;
6637  size_t num_rows = table.size();
6638  size_t num_columns = table.estimate_num_columns();
6639 
6640  std::vector<size_t> row_heights, column_widths{};
6641 
6642  for (size_t i = 0; i < num_columns; ++i) {
6643  Column column = table.column(i);
6644  size_t configured_width = column.get_configured_width();
6645  size_t computed_width = column.get_computed_width();
6646  if (configured_width != 0)
6647  column_widths.push_back(configured_width);
6648  else
6649  column_widths.push_back(computed_width);
6650  }
6651 
6652  for (size_t i = 0; i < num_rows; ++i) {
6653  Row row = table[i];
6654  size_t configured_height = row.get_configured_height();
6655  size_t computed_height = row.get_computed_height(column_widths);
6656 
6657  // NOTE: Unlike column width, row height is calculated as the max
6658  // b/w configured height and computed height
6659  // which means that .width() has higher precedence than .height()
6660  // when both are configured by the user
6661  //
6662  // TODO: Maybe this can be configured?
6663  // If such a configuration is exposed, i.e., prefer height over width
6664  // then the logic will be reversed, i.e.,
6665  // column_widths.push_back(std::max(configured_width, computed_width))
6666  // and
6667  // row_height = configured_height if != 0 else computed_height
6668 
6669  row_heights.push_back(std::max(configured_height, computed_height));
6670  }
6671 
6672  result.first = row_heights;
6673  result.second = column_widths;
6674 
6675  return result;
6676 }
6677 
6678 inline void Printer::print_table(std::ostream &stream, TableInternal &table) {
6679  size_t num_rows = table.size();
6680  size_t num_columns = table.estimate_num_columns();
6681  auto dimensions = compute_cell_dimensions(table);
6682  auto row_heights = dimensions.first;
6683  auto column_widths = dimensions.second;
6684 
6685  // For each row,
6686  for (size_t i = 0; i < num_rows; ++i) {
6687 
6688  // Print top border
6689  bool border_top_printed{true};
6690  for (size_t j = 0; j < num_columns; ++j) {
6691  border_top_printed &= print_cell_border_top(stream, table, {i, j},
6692  {row_heights[i], column_widths[j]}, num_columns);
6693  }
6694  if (border_top_printed)
6695  stream << termcolor::reset << "\n";
6696 
6697  // Print row contents with word wrapping
6698  for (size_t k = 0; k < row_heights[i]; ++k) {
6699  for (size_t j = 0; j < num_columns; ++j) {
6700  print_row_in_cell(stream, table, {i, j}, {row_heights[i], column_widths[j]}, num_columns,
6701  k);
6702  }
6703  if (k + 1 < row_heights[i])
6704  stream << termcolor::reset << "\n";
6705  }
6706 
6707  if (i + 1 == num_rows) {
6708 
6709  // Check if there is bottom border to print:
6710  auto bottom_border_needed{true};
6711  for (size_t j = 0; j < num_columns; ++j) {
6712  auto cell = table[i][j];
6713  auto format = cell.format();
6714  auto corner = *format.corner_bottom_left_;
6715  auto border_bottom = *format.border_bottom_;
6716  if (corner == "" && border_bottom == "") {
6717  bottom_border_needed = false;
6718  break;
6719  }
6720  }
6721 
6722  if (bottom_border_needed)
6723  stream << termcolor::reset << "\n";
6724  // Print bottom border for table
6725  for (size_t j = 0; j < num_columns; ++j) {
6726  print_cell_border_bottom(stream, table, {i, j}, {row_heights[i], column_widths[j]},
6727  num_columns);
6728  }
6729  }
6730  if (i + 1 < num_rows)
6731  stream << termcolor::reset << "\n"; // Don't add newline after last row
6732  }
6733 }
6734 
6735 inline void Printer::print_row_in_cell(std::ostream &stream, TableInternal &table,
6736  const std::pair<size_t, size_t> &index,
6737  const std::pair<size_t, size_t> &dimension,
6738  size_t num_columns, size_t row_index) {
6739  auto column_width = dimension.second;
6740  auto cell = table[index.first][index.second];
6741  auto locale = cell.locale();
6742  auto is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled = cell.is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled();
6743  std::locale::global(std::locale(locale));
6744  auto format = cell.format();
6745  auto text = cell.get_text();
6746  auto word_wrapped_text =
6747  Format::word_wrap(text, column_width, locale, is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled);
6748  auto text_height = std::count(word_wrapped_text.begin(), word_wrapped_text.end(), '\n') + 1;
6749  auto padding_top = *format.padding_top_;
6750 
6751  if (*format.show_border_left_) {
6752  apply_element_style(stream, *format.border_left_color_, *format.border_left_background_color_,
6753  {});
6754  stream << *format.border_left_;
6755  reset_element_style(stream);
6756  }
6757 
6758  apply_element_style(stream, *format.font_color_, *format.font_background_color_, {});
6759  if (row_index < padding_top) {
6760  // Padding top
6761  stream << std::string(column_width, ' ');
6762  } else if (row_index >= padding_top && (row_index <= (padding_top + text_height))) {
6763  // // Row contents
6764 
6765  // Retrieve padding left and right
6766  // (column_width - padding_left - padding_right) is the amount of space
6767  // available for cell text - Use this to word wrap cell contents
6768  auto padding_left = *format.padding_left_;
6769  auto padding_right = *format.padding_right_;
6770 
6771  // Check if input text has embedded \n that are to be respected
6772  auto newlines_in_input = Format::split_lines(text, "\n", cell.locale(),
6773  cell.is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled())
6774  .size() -
6775  1;
6776  std::string word_wrapped_text;
6777 
6778  // If there are no embedded \n characters, then apply word wrap
6779  if (newlines_in_input == 0) {
6780  // Apply word wrapping to input text
6781  // Then display one word-wrapped line at a time within cell
6782  if (column_width > (padding_left + padding_right))
6783  word_wrapped_text =
6784  Format::word_wrap(text, column_width - padding_left - padding_right, cell.locale(),
6785  cell.is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled());
6786  else {
6787  // Configured column width cannot be lower than (padding_left + padding_right)
6788  // This is a bad configuration
6789  // E.g., the user is trying to force the column width to be 5
6790  // when padding_left and padding_right are each configured to 3
6791  // (padding_left + padding_right) = 6 > column_width
6792  }
6793  } else {
6794  word_wrapped_text = text; // repect the embedded '\n' characters
6795  }
6796 
6797  auto lines = Format::split_lines(word_wrapped_text, "\n", cell.locale(),
6798  cell.is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled());
6799 
6800  if (row_index - padding_top < lines.size()) {
6801  auto line = lines[row_index - padding_top];
6802 
6803  // Print left padding characters
6804  stream << std::string(padding_left, ' ');
6805 
6806  // Print word-wrapped line
6807  line = Format::trim(line);
6808  auto line_with_padding_size =
6809  get_sequence_length(line, cell.locale(), cell.is_multi_byte_character_support_enabled()) +
6810  padding_left + padding_right;
6811  switch (*format.font_align_) {
6812  case FontAlign::left:
6813  print_content_left_aligned(stream, line, format, line_with_padding_size, column_width);
6814  break;
6815  case FontAlign::center:
6816  print_content_center_aligned(stream, line, format, line_with_padding_size, column_width);
6817  break;
6818  case FontAlign::right:
6819  print_content_right_aligned(stream, line, format, line_with_padding_size, column_width);
6820  break;
6821  }
6822 
6823  // Print right padding characters
6824  stream << std::string(padding_right, ' ');
6825  } else
6826  stream << std::string(column_width, ' ');
6827 
6828  } else {
6829  // Padding bottom
6830  stream << std::string(column_width, ' ');
6831  }
6832 
6833  reset_element_style(stream);
6834 
6835  if (index.second + 1 == num_columns) {
6836  // Print right border after last column
6837  if (*format.show_border_right_) {
6838  apply_element_style(stream, *format.border_right_color_,
6839  *format.border_right_background_color_, {});
6840  stream << *format.border_right_;
6841  reset_element_style(stream);
6842  }
6843  }
6844 }
6845 
6846 inline bool Printer::print_cell_border_top(std::ostream &stream, TableInternal &table,
6847  const std::pair<size_t, size_t> &index,
6848  const std::pair<size_t, size_t> &dimension,
6849  size_t num_columns) {
6850  auto cell = table[index.first][index.second];
6851  auto locale = cell.locale();
6852  std::locale::global(std::locale(locale));
6853  auto format = cell.format();
6854  auto column_width = dimension.second;
6855 
6856  auto corner = *format.corner_top_left_;
6857  auto corner_color = *format.corner_top_left_color_;
6858  auto corner_background_color = *format.corner_top_left_background_color_;
6859  auto border_top = *format.border_top_;
6860 
6861  if ((corner == "" && border_top == "") || !*format.show_border_top_)
6862  return false;
6863 
6864  apply_element_style(stream, corner_color, corner_background_color, {});
6865  stream << corner;
6866  reset_element_style(stream);
6867 
6868  for (size_t i = 0; i < column_width; ++i) {
6869  apply_element_style(stream, *format.border_top_color_, *format.border_top_background_color_,
6870  {});
6871  stream << border_top;
6872  reset_element_style(stream);
6873  }
6874 
6875  if (index.second + 1 == num_columns) {
6876  // Print corner after last column
6877  corner = *format.corner_top_right_;
6878  corner_color = *format.corner_top_right_color_;
6879  corner_background_color = *format.corner_top_right_background_color_;
6880 
6881  apply_element_style(stream, corner_color, corner_background_color, {});
6882  stream << corner;
6883  reset_element_style(stream);
6884  }
6885  return true;
6886 }
6887 
6888 inline bool Printer::print_cell_border_bottom(std::ostream &stream, TableInternal &table,
6889  const std::pair<size_t, size_t> &index,
6890  const std::pair<size_t, size_t> &dimension,
6891  size_t num_columns) {
6892  auto cell = table[index.first][index.second];
6893  auto locale = cell.locale();
6894  std::locale::global(std::locale(locale));
6895  auto format = cell.format();
6896  auto column_width = dimension.second;
6897 
6898  auto corner = *format.corner_bottom_left_;
6899  auto corner_color = *format.corner_bottom_left_color_;
6900  auto corner_background_color = *format.corner_bottom_left_background_color_;
6901  auto border_bottom = *format.border_bottom_;
6902 
6903  if ((corner == "" && border_bottom == "") || !*format.show_border_bottom_)
6904  return false;
6905 
6906  apply_element_style(stream, corner_color, corner_background_color, {});
6907  stream << corner;
6908  reset_element_style(stream);
6909 
6910  for (size_t i = 0; i < column_width; ++i) {
6911  apply_element_style(stream, *format.border_bottom_color_,
6912  *format.border_bottom_background_color_, {});
6913  stream << border_bottom;
6914  reset_element_style(stream);
6915  }
6916 
6917  if (index.second + 1 == num_columns) {
6918  // Print corner after last column
6919  corner = *format.corner_bottom_right_;
6920  corner_color = *format.corner_bottom_right_color_;
6921  corner_background_color = *format.corner_bottom_right_background_color_;
6922 
6923  apply_element_style(stream, corner_color, corner_background_color, {});
6924  stream << corner;
6925  reset_element_style(stream);
6926  }
6927  return true;
6928 }
6929 
6930 } // namespace tabulate
6931 
6932 /*
6933  __ ___. .__ __
6934 _/ |______ \_ |__ __ __| | _____ _/ |_ ____
6935 \ __\__ \ | __ \| | \ | \__ \\ __\/ __ \
6936  | | / __ \| \_\ \ | / |__/ __ \| | \ ___/
6937  |__| (____ /___ /____/|____(____ /__| \___ >
6938  \/ \/ \/ \/
6939 Table Maker for Modern C++
6940 https://github.com/p-ranav/tabulate
6941 
6942 Licensed under the MIT License <http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT>.
6943 SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
6944 Copyright (c) 2019 Pranav Srinivas Kumar <pranav.srinivas.kumar@gmail.com>.
6945 
6946 Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy
6947 of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
6948 in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
6949 to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
6950 copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
6951 furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
6952 
6953 The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
6954 copies or substantial portions of the Software.
6955 
6956 THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
6957 IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
6958 FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
6959 AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
6960 LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
6961 OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
6962 SOFTWARE.
6963 */
6964 #pragma once
6965 // #include <tabulate/table_internal.hpp>
6966 
6967 #if __cplusplus >= 201703L
6968 #include <variant>
6969 using std::get_if;
6970 using std::holds_alternative;
6971 using std::variant;
6972 using std::visit;
6973 #else
6974 // #include <tabulate/variant_lite.hpp>
6975 using nonstd::get_if;
6976 using nonstd::holds_alternative;
6977 using nonstd::variant;
6978 using nonstd::visit;
6979 #endif
6980 
6981 #include <utility>
6982 
6983 namespace tabulate {
6984 
6985 class Table {
6986 public:
6987  Table() : table_(TableInternal::create()) {}
6988 
6989  Table &add_row(const std::vector<variant<std::string, const char *, Table>> &cells) {
6990 
6991  if (rows_ == 0) {
6992  // This is the first row added
6993  // cells.size() is the number of columns
6994  cols_ = cells.size();
6995  }
6996 
6997  std::vector<std::string> cell_strings;
6998  if (cells.size() < cols_) {
6999  cell_strings.resize(cols_);
7000  std::fill(cell_strings.begin(), cell_strings.end(), "");
7001  } else {
7002  cell_strings.resize(cells.size());
7003  std::fill(cell_strings.begin(), cell_strings.end(), "");
7004  }
7005 
7006  for (size_t i = 0; i < cells.size(); ++i) {
7007  auto cell = cells[i];
7008  if (holds_alternative<std::string>(cell)) {
7009  cell_strings[i] = *get_if<std::string>(&cell);
7010  } else if (holds_alternative<const char *>(cell)) {
7011  cell_strings[i] = *get_if<const char *>(&cell);
7012  } else {
7013  auto table = *get_if<Table>(&cell);
7014  std::stringstream stream;
7015  table.print(stream);
7016  cell_strings[i] = stream.str();
7017  }
7018  }
7019 
7020  table_->add_row(cell_strings);
7021  rows_ += 1;
7022  return *this;
7023  }
7024 
7025  Row &operator[](size_t index) { return row(index); }
7026 
7027  Row &row(size_t index) { return (*table_)[index]; }
7028 
7029  Column column(size_t index) { return table_->column(index); }
7030 
7031  Format &format() { return table_->format(); }
7032 
7033  void print(std::ostream &stream) { table_->print(stream); }
7034 
7035  std::string str() {
7036  std::stringstream stream;
7037  print(stream);
7038  return stream.str();
7039  }
7040 
7041  std::pair<size_t, size_t> shape() { return table_->shape(); }
7042 
7043  class RowIterator {
7044  public:
7045  explicit RowIterator(std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Row>>::iterator ptr) : ptr(ptr) {}
7046 
7047  RowIterator operator++() {
7048  ++ptr;
7049  return *this;
7050  }
7051  bool operator!=(const RowIterator &other) const { return ptr != other.ptr; }
7052  Row &operator*() { return **ptr; }
7053 
7054  private:
7055  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Row>>::iterator ptr;
7056  };
7057 
7058  auto begin() -> RowIterator { return RowIterator(table_->rows_.begin()); }
7059  auto end() -> RowIterator { return RowIterator(table_->rows_.end()); }
7060 
7061 private:
7062  friend class MarkdownExporter;
7063  friend class LatexExporter;
7064  friend class AsciiDocExporter;
7065 
7066  friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &stream, const Table &table);
7067  size_t rows_{0};
7068  size_t cols_{0};
7069  std::shared_ptr<TableInternal> table_;
7070 };
7071 
7072 inline std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &stream, const Table &table) {
7073  const_cast<Table &>(table).print(stream);
7074  return stream;
7075 }
7076 
7077 } // namespace tabulate
7078 
7079 /*
7080  __ ___. .__ __
7081 _/ |______ \_ |__ __ __| | _____ _/ |_ ____
7082 \ __\__ \ | __ \| | \ | \__ \\ __\/ __ \
7083  | | / __ \| \_\ \ | / |__/ __ \| | \ ___/
7084  |__| (____ /___ /____/|____(____ /__| \___ >
7085  \/ \/ \/ \/
7086 Table Maker for Modern C++
7087 https://github.com/p-ranav/tabulate
7088 
7089 Licensed under the MIT License <http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT>.
7090 SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
7091 Copyright (c) 2019 Pranav Srinivas Kumar <pranav.srinivas.kumar@gmail.com>.
7092 
7093 Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy
7094 of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
7095 in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
7096 to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
7097 copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
7098 furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
7099 
7100 The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
7101 copies or substantial portions of the Software.
7102 
7103 THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
7104 IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
7105 FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
7106 AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
7107 LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
7108 OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
7109 SOFTWARE.
7110 */
7111 #pragma once
7112 #include <string>
7113 // #include <tabulate/table.hpp>
7114 
7115 namespace tabulate {
7116 
7117 class Exporter {
7118 public:
7119  virtual std::string dump(Table &table) = 0;
7120  virtual ~Exporter() {}
7121 };
7122 
7123 } // namespace tabulate
7124 
7125 /*
7126  __ ___. .__ __
7127 _/ |______ \_ |__ __ __| | _____ _/ |_ ____
7128 \ __\__ \ | __ \| | \ | \__ \\ __\/ __ \
7129  | | / __ \| \_\ \ | / |__/ __ \| | \ ___/
7130  |__| (____ /___ /____/|____(____ /__| \___ >
7131  \/ \/ \/ \/
7132 Table Maker for Modern C++
7133 https://github.com/p-ranav/tabulate
7134 
7135 Licensed under the MIT License <http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT>.
7136 SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
7137 Copyright (c) 2019 Pranav Srinivas Kumar <pranav.srinivas.kumar@gmail.com>.
7138 
7139 Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy
7140 of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
7141 in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
7142 to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
7143 copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
7144 furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
7145 
7146 The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
7147 copies or substantial portions of the Software.
7148 
7149 THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
7150 IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
7151 FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
7152 AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
7153 LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
7154 OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
7155 SOFTWARE.
7156 */
7157 #pragma once
7158 // #include <tabulate/exporter.hpp>
7159 
7160 namespace tabulate {
7161 
7162 class MarkdownExporter : public Exporter {
7163 public:
7164  std::string dump(Table &table) override {
7165  std::string result{""};
7166  apply_markdown_format(table);
7167  result = table.str();
7168  restore_table_format(table);
7169  return result;
7170  }
7171 
7172  virtual ~MarkdownExporter() {}
7173 
7174 private:
7175  void add_alignment_header_row(Table &table) {
7176  auto &rows = table.table_->rows_;
7177 
7178  if (rows.size() >= 1) {
7179  auto alignment_row = std::make_shared<Row>(table.table_->shared_from_this());
7180 
7181  // Create alignment header cells
7182  std::vector<std::string> alignment_cells{};
7183  for (auto &cell : table[0]) {
7184  auto format = cell.format();
7185  if (format.font_align_.value() == FontAlign::left) {
7186  alignment_cells.push_back(":----");
7187  } else if (format.font_align_.value() == FontAlign::center) {
7188  alignment_cells.push_back(":---:");
7189  } else if (format.font_align_.value() == FontAlign::right) {
7190  alignment_cells.push_back("----:");
7191  }
7192  }
7193 
7194  // Add alignment header cells to alignment row
7195  for (auto &c : alignment_cells) {
7196  auto cell = std::make_shared<Cell>(alignment_row);
7197  cell->format()
7198  .hide_border_top()
7199  .hide_border_bottom()
7200  .border_left("|")
7201  .border_right("|")
7202  .column_separator("|")
7203  .corner("|");
7204  cell->set_text(c);
7205  if (c == ":---:")
7206  cell->format().font_align(FontAlign::center);
7207  else if (c == "----:")
7208  cell->format().font_align(FontAlign::right);
7209  alignment_row->add_cell(cell);
7210  }
7211 
7212  // Insert alignment header row
7213  if (rows.size() > 1)
7214  rows.insert(rows.begin() + 1, alignment_row);
7215  else
7216  rows.push_back(alignment_row);
7217  }
7218  }
7219 
7220  void remove_alignment_header_row(Table &table) {
7221  auto &rows = table.table_->rows_;
7222  table.table_->rows_.erase(rows.begin() + 1);
7223  }
7224 
7225  void apply_markdown_format(Table &table) {
7226  // Apply markdown format to cells in each row
7227  for (auto row : table) {
7228  for (auto &cell : row) {
7229  auto format = cell.format();
7230  formats_.push_back(format);
7231  cell.format()
7232  .hide_border_top()
7233  .hide_border_bottom()
7234  .border_left("|")
7235  .border_right("|")
7236  .column_separator("|")
7237  .corner("|");
7238  }
7239  }
7240  // Add alignment header row at position 1
7241  add_alignment_header_row(table);
7242  }
7243 
7244  void restore_table_format(Table &table) {
7245  // Remove alignment header row at position 1
7246  remove_alignment_header_row(table);
7247 
7248  // Restore original formatting for each cell
7249  size_t format_index{0};
7250  for (auto row : table) {
7251  for (auto &cell : row) {
7252  cell.format() = formats_[format_index];
7253  format_index += 1;
7254  }
7255  }
7256  }
7257 
7258  std::vector<Format> formats_;
7259 };
7260 
7261 } // namespace tabulate
7262 
7263 /*
7264  __ ___. .__ __
7265 _/ |______ \_ |__ __ __| | _____ _/ |_ ____
7266 \ __\__ \ | __ \| | \ | \__ \\ __\/ __ \
7267  | | / __ \| \_\ \ | / |__/ __ \| | \ ___/
7268  |__| (____ /___ /____/|____(____ /__| \___ >
7269  \/ \/ \/ \/
7270 Table Maker for Modern C++
7271 https://github.com/p-ranav/tabulate
7272 
7273 Licensed under the MIT License <http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT>.
7274 SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
7275 Copyright (c) 2019 Pranav Srinivas Kumar <pranav.srinivas.kumar@gmail.com>.
7276 
7277 Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy
7278 of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
7279 in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
7280 to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
7281 copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
7282 furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
7283 
7284 The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
7285 copies or substantial portions of the Software.
7286 
7287 THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
7288 IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
7289 FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
7290 AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
7291 LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
7292 OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
7293 SOFTWARE.
7294 */
7295 #pragma once
7296 // #include <tabulate/exporter.hpp>
7297 
7298 #if __cplusplus >= 201703L
7299 #include <optional>
7300 using std::optional;
7301 #else
7302 // #include <tabulate/optional_lite.hpp>
7303 using nonstd::optional;
7304 #endif
7305 
7306 namespace tabulate {
7307 
7308 class LatexExporter : public Exporter {
7309 
7310  static const char new_line = '\n';
7311 
7312 public:
7313  class ExportOptions {
7314  public:
7315  ExportOptions &indentation(std::size_t value) {
7316  indentation_ = value;
7317  return *this;
7318  }
7319 
7320  private:
7321  friend class LatexExporter;
7322  optional<size_t> indentation_;
7323  };
7324 
7325  ExportOptions &configure() { return options_; }
7326 
7327  std::string dump(Table &table) override {
7328  std::string result{"\\begin{tabular}"};
7329  result += new_line;
7330 
7331  result += add_alignment_header(table);
7332  result += new_line;
7333  const auto rows = table.rows_;
7334  // iterate content and put text into the table.
7335  for (size_t i = 0; i < rows; i++) {
7336  auto &row = table[i];
7337  // apply row content indentation
7338  if (options_.indentation_.has_value()) {
7339  result += std::string(options_.indentation_.value(), ' ');
7340  }
7341 
7342  for (size_t j = 0; j < row.size(); j++) {
7343 
7344  result += row[j].get_text();
7345 
7346  // check column position, need "\\" at the end of each row
7347  if (j < row.size() - 1) {
7348  result += " & ";
7349  } else {
7350  result += " \\\\";
7351  }
7352  }
7353  result += new_line;
7354  }
7355 
7356  result += "\\end{tabular}";
7357  return result;
7358  }
7359 
7360  virtual ~LatexExporter() {}
7361 
7362 private:
7363  std::string add_alignment_header(Table &table) {
7364  std::string result{"{"};
7365 
7366  for (auto &cell : table[0]) {
7367  auto format = cell.format();
7368  if (format.font_align_.value() == FontAlign::left) {
7369  result += 'l';
7370  } else if (format.font_align_.value() == FontAlign::center) {
7371  result += 'c';
7372  } else if (format.font_align_.value() == FontAlign::right) {
7373  result += 'r';
7374  }
7375  }
7376 
7377  result += "}";
7378  return result;
7379  }
7380  ExportOptions options_;
7381 };
7382 
7383 } // namespace tabulate
7384 
7385 /*
7386  __ ___. .__ __
7387 _/ |______ \_ |__ __ __| | _____ _/ |_ ____
7388 \ __\__ \ | __ \| | \ | \__ \\ __\/ __ \
7389  | | / __ \| \_\ \ | / |__/ __ \| | \ ___/
7390  |__| (____ /___ /____/|____(____ /__| \___ >
7391  \/ \/ \/ \/
7392 Table Maker for Modern C++
7393 https://github.com/p-ranav/tabulate
7394 
7395 Licensed under the MIT License <http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT>.
7396 SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
7397 Copyright (c) 2019 Pranav Srinivas Kumar <pranav.srinivas.kumar@gmail.com>.
7398 
7399 Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy
7400 of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
7401 in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
7402 to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
7403 copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
7404 furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
7405 
7406 The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
7407 copies or substantial portions of the Software.
7408 
7409 THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
7410 IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
7411 FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
7412 AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
7413 LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
7414 OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
7415 SOFTWARE.
7416 */
7417 #pragma once
7418 #include <algorithm>
7419 #include <optional>
7420 #include <sstream>
7421 #include <string>
7422 // #include <tabulate/exporter.hpp>
7423 
7424 namespace tabulate {
7425 
7426 class AsciiDocExporter : public Exporter {
7427 
7428  static const char new_line = '\n';
7429 
7430 public:
7431  std::string dump(Table &table) override {
7432  std::stringstream ss;
7433  ss << add_alignment_header(table);
7434  ss << new_line;
7435 
7436  const auto rows = table.rows_;
7437  // iterate content and put text into the table.
7438  for (size_t row_index = 0; row_index < rows; row_index++) {
7439  auto &row = table[row_index];
7440 
7441  for (size_t cell_index = 0; cell_index < row.size(); cell_index++) {
7442  ss << "|";
7443  ss << add_formatted_cell(row[cell_index]);
7444  }
7445  ss << new_line;
7446  if (row_index == 0) {
7447  ss << new_line;
7448  }
7449  }
7450 
7451  ss << "|===";
7452  return ss.str();
7453  }
7454 
7455  virtual ~AsciiDocExporter() {}
7456 
7457 private:
7458  std::string add_formatted_cell(Cell &cell) const {
7459  std::stringstream ss;
7460  auto format = cell.format();
7461  std::string cell_string = cell.get_text();
7462 
7463  auto font_style = format.font_style_.value();
7464 
7465  bool format_bold = false;
7466  bool format_italic = false;
7467  std::for_each(font_style.begin(), font_style.end(), [&](FontStyle &style) {
7468  if (style == FontStyle::bold) {
7469  format_bold = true;
7470  } else if (style == FontStyle::italic) {
7471  format_italic = true;
7472  }
7473  });
7474 
7475  if (format_bold) {
7476  ss << '*';
7477  }
7478  if (format_italic) {
7479  ss << '_';
7480  }
7481 
7482  ss << cell_string;
7483  if (format_italic) {
7484  ss << '_';
7485  }
7486  if (format_bold) {
7487  ss << '*';
7488  }
7489  return ss.str();
7490  }
7491 
7492  std::string add_alignment_header(Table &table) {
7493  std::stringstream ss;
7494  ss << (R"([cols=")");
7495 
7496  size_t column_count = table[0].size();
7497  size_t column_index = 0;
7498  for (auto &cell : table[0]) {
7499  auto format = cell.format();
7500 
7501  if (format.font_align_.value() == FontAlign::left) {
7502  ss << '<';
7503  } else if (format.font_align_.value() == FontAlign::center) {
7504  ss << '^';
7505  } else if (format.font_align_.value() == FontAlign::right) {
7506  ss << '>';
7507  }
7508 
7509  ++column_index;
7510  if (column_index != column_count) {
7511  ss << ",";
7512  }
7513  }
7514 
7515  ss << R"("])";
7516  ss << new_line;
7517  ss << "|===";
7518 
7519  return ss.str();
7520  }
7521 };
7522 
7523 } // namespace tabulate
7524 
7525 /*
7526  __ ___. .__ __
7527 _/ |______ \_ |__ __ __| | _____ _/ |_ ____
7528 \ __\__ \ | __ \| | \ | \__ \\ __\/ __ \
7529  | | / __ \| \_\ \ | / |__/ __ \| | \ ___/
7530  |__| (____ /___ /____/|____(____ /__| \___ >
7531  \/ \/ \/ \/
7532 Table Maker for Modern C++
7533 https://github.com/p-ranav/tabulate
7534 
7535 Licensed under the MIT License <http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT>.
7536 SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
7537 Copyright (c) 2019 Pranav Srinivas Kumar <pranav.srinivas.kumar@gmail.com>.
7538 
7539 Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy
7540 of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
7541 in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
7542 to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
7543 copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
7544 furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
7545 
7546 The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
7547 copies or substantial portions of the Software.
7548 
7549 THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
7550 IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
7551 FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
7552 AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
7553 LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
7554 OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
7555 SOFTWARE.
7556 */

7569 // #endif

7573 // #endif
7574 
7575 // Project version
7576 #define TABULATE_VERSION_MAJOR 1
7577 #define TABULATE_VERSION_MINOR 4
7578 #define TABULATE_VERSION_PATCH 0
7579 
7580 // Composing the protocol version string from major, and minor
7581 #define TABULATE_CONCATENATE(A, B) TABULATE_CONCATENATE_IMPL(A, B)
7582 #define TABULATE_CONCATENATE_IMPL(A, B) A##B
7583 #define TABULATE_STRINGIFY(a) TABULATE_STRINGIFY_IMPL(a)
7584 #define TABULATE_STRINGIFY_IMPL(a) #a
7585 
7586 #endif
